paragraphs.text: There was much more I wanted to include in last night’s thought-ramble, but it was near 2 am and I needed to try to get some sleep. However here’s something really important I’d like to add before moving on to other rambles: my gratitude to the Mediumers from 2016 whom I’ve personally found to be inspirers or encouragers (often both), and whose stuff is, in my mind, golden.
paragraphs.name: 470f

paragraphs.text: You are both awesomesauce. Teheh! :)
paragraphs.name: 8b2b

paragraphs.text: Life is not bad. I am just very sad and do not know how to get past it. I believe between my mom, my sister, my grandson, and my home… there’s been no closure and may never be. I need to make myself happy. Thank you for this moment-it feels good right now.
paragraphs.name: b17f

virtuals.subtitle: That was me earlier. My Google was signed into my alter ego that writes even less than I write. Anyway, thank you Tessa for including me. I…

content.subtitle: That was me earlier. My Google was signed into my alter ego that writes even less than I write. Anyway, thank you Tessa for including me. I…

a8ddba08941.title: Wow! Thank you for including me!

paragraphs.text: Wow! Thank you for including me! This is a stellar list. Medium has been an amazing experience. I know that the recent announcement has most of us on edge and of course the fact that talent had to be let go is beyond tragic.
paragraphs.name: 9d68

paragraphs.text: But, the thing is that I would never be the writer I am today if I hadn’t been introduced to this…

virtuals.subtitle: But, the thing is that I would never be the writer I am today if I hadn’t been introduced to this platform by a friend back in 2013 when it…

content.subtitle: But, the thing is that I would never be the writer I am today if I hadn’t been introduced to this platform by a friend back in 2013 when it…

c1bfae5dee4d.title: Teraisa, I am so sorry to hear about your grandson and mom, and I very much hope you will soon be…

paragraphs.text: Teraisa, I am so sorry to hear about your grandson and mom, and I very much hope you will soon be lifted from your sadness. I will pray for you. :)
paragraphs.name: 0a1f

paragraphs.text: Thank you. Right after I came here last.. Bentley Sky Walker went back into the hospital and is still there. It’s painful. And it’s been a depressing week. Please do keep praying. http://SkyTracking.xyz
paragraphs.name: f719

paragraphs.text: Thank you Tessa! I love hearing this because that is exactly why I write. I never expect everyone to agree with me. That’s unnatural and boring. I adore people like you — because it gives me the fuel to keep at it!
Happy 2017! And thanks again!

6bf5dbf8631d.title: Thank you for the shout out Tessa!

paragraphs.text: Thank you for the shout out Tessa! High praise and stellar company to be amongst. You’re platinum in my book. Keep writing and I’ll keep reading, recommending and responding. Hope your new year has started great! :)
paragraphs.name: 523b

paragraphs.text: Not weird at all! lol
paragraphs.name: a786

1c589dee6a9e.title: Tessa, thank you so much for the shout-out.

paragraphs.text: Tessa, thank you so much for the shout-out. Also, thank you for continuing to read my stuff. It’s cathartic enough to write it, but to have someone read it and get something from it — it’s truly heartwarming.
paragraphs.name: 53cf

paragraphs.text: Thank you.
paragraphs.name: 7f3c

e37ef9d45a2e.title: Nice to hear from you, Tessa. Thanks right back to you, and best wishes for a great 2017.

paragraphs.text: Nice to hear from you, Tessa. Thanks right back to you, and best wishes for a great 2017.
paragraphs.name: f633

b95449f588e5.title: Charlotte, I don’t think I ever mentioned how I love your bio, teheh. :) ❤

paragraphs.text: Charlotte, I don’t think I ever mentioned how I love your bio, teheh. :) ❤
paragraphs.name: 96d7

34f9eb1f361d.title: Thank you, SF Ali! BTW, love your new (?) bio. :)

paragraphs.text: Thank you, SF Ali! BTW, love your new (?) bio. :)
paragraphs.name: 0b37

5095de857232.title: I have been inspired by all of the other amusing bios that have come before me!

paragraphs.text: I have been inspired by all of the other amusing bios that have come before me! Sometimes I will follow a writer just because their bio is hilarious. Is that weird? ;)
I am so glad, Gail! If I recall correctly I found you through Randomly Me’s recommendations, and I am so thankful I did. :)
paragraphs.name: 9da5

paragraphs.text: Anytime, Mike, and thank YOU. Yep, I get a lot from what you write. I love writing that makes me think. You certainly do that. :)
paragraphs.name: a3f4

a58f2efd8bd0.title: Thank you Tessa, I am honoured.

paragraphs.text: Thank you Tessa, I am honoured. You are one of the first people to read my short stories so it’s fair to say that the feeling is mutual!
paragraphs.name: 7a95

f5de05c310b1.title: ❤ — Right back at you! Thank you. :)

paragraphs.text: ❤ — Right back at you! Thank you. :)

Ezinne, thank you so much. I started on Medium about a year ago and your extremely authentic, talented writing caught my eye. I have a feeling we may not always agree politically, but I don’t really care about that. The fact is you are an amazing writer. I wish you all the best. :)
paragraphs.name: 70a4

ecb3b6918c25.title: Seriously, you have me in tears and I haven’t finished reading yet… it’s been a very difficult two…

paragraphs.text: Seriously, you have me in tears and I haven’t finished reading yet… it’s been a very difficult two years and to think I inspired anyone at all is just amazing. Thank you. ❤
paragraphs.name: d8a6

ed9b9d768765.title: Renee, I truly love your fresh and delightful take on fantasy.

paragraphs.text: Renee, I truly love your fresh and delightful take on fantasy. I’m so glad to have found you here. :)
paragraphs.name: 71ce

ad3ee9866ece.title: Thank you for the mention — and for reading and editing my work.

paragraphs.text: Thank you for the mention — and for reading and editing my work. It also made a good part of my year.
paragraphs.name: a1b5

paragraphs.text: Anytime, Zac. I appreciate you. :)
paragraphs.name: 7a9d

paragraphs.text: wow, thanks Tessa!
paragraphs.name: e1eb

paragraphs.text: Hey Tessa! Thank you for reading my stories here. Your early support did much to build my confidence. You are an uplifter, no doubt!
paragraphs.name: 818c

paragraphs.text: Randomly Me is the best of friends, right? I am thankful for all of the connections made here.

e801d0092e07.name: Tessa
e801d0092e07.bio: Thinking & writing on a hodgepodge. Artsier stuff’s at https://medium.com/poi-holloi. Per Medium my ‘top stories’ list has a ‘bug’.

a743cfc93011.name: Steve Sampson
a743cfc93011.bio: Writer, father, husband, drummer, and reliable defender in the old-guy soccer league. Also head communicator and editor @ArabellaAdvisor. All claims here on me.

4d3a3cc850d4.name: Gail Boenning
4d3a3cc850d4.bio: Never underestimate the power of a story. gailboenning@gmail.com

49842523be47.name: Mike Sturm
49842523be47.bio: I am but a boy grown tall. I hope to make you think. I think to make you hope. http://tinyletter.com/mike_sturm

2dc2523531fa.name: Ezinne Ukoha
2dc2523531fa.bio: Juggling Wordsmith and delightfully mumbling poet. The world is a stage and William Shakespeare is a Taurus - like me!

36fb50435f30.name: Charlotte Franklin
36fb50435f30.bio: An occasional pearl of wisdom from a craggy chunk of sand.

a4009bf64e8b.bio: Info Freak~Victim Advocate~TCF: True Crime•World News•Justice~Prev: coach•director•cheer•gym~N.NV Fam Mag Ed~COMPULSIVE WRITER~and a rambling Mom 💟

6cf1fe1f939b.bio: Writer. New book Taco Jehovah: http://joshspilker.com/tacojehovah/
